title: User Login Success with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in with valid username and password and is redirected to the dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid username and password
Click login button
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to the main dashboard page

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login failure and proper error message display when incorrect username or password is used.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid username or password
Click login button
Verify login attempt is rejected and appropriate error message is shown

title: First User is Automatically Assigned Admin Role
description: Verify that when the application is first used and no users exist, the first registered user is assigned the admin role.

steps.description: Clear existing user data or start fresh environment
Register or login as first user
Verify the user is automatically assigned the Admin role

title: Forced Password Change on Admin Reset
description: Verify that after an admin resets a user's password, the user is forced to change their password upon next login.

steps.description: Login as admin
Reset password for a regular user
Log out and then login as the user with the reset password
Verify user is prompted to change password before accessing any other page

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that users have access permissions consistent with their roles: Admins have full access while regular users have limited permissions.

steps.description: Login as a regular user
Attempt to access admin-only features e.g. User Management, Settings
Verify access is denied or features are hidden
Login as an admin user
Access User Management, Relay Controls and Settings pages
Verify access is granted and full functionality is available

title: Real-time Sensor Data Update Interval
description: Verify that the sensor data on dashboard and sensor pages refreshes at a minimum interval of 5 seconds.

steps.description: Login and navigate to dashboard/sensor pages
Observe sensor readings and verify they update at least every 5 seconds

title: Sensor Data Historical Views and Export
description: Verify users can view sensor historical data for supported time ranges and export data to correctly formatted Excel files.

steps.description: Navigate to individual sensor history pages
Select various historical time ranges (e.g. 1 day, 1 week, 1 month)
Verify data is aggregated and displayed correctly in charts and tables
Use export function to download Excel files
Verify the exported Excel files contain correct data and formatting matching the selected parameters

title: Relay Control Toggle and Rename with MQTT Sync
description: Verify that the admin can toggle and rename each of the 4 relays and that the status synchronizes correctly via MQTT and updates persistently in the database and UI.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to relay control page
Toggle relay status ON and OFF
Verify MQTT messages are sent and status updates visually in the UI and backend database
Rename relays with new custom names
Verify relay names update in the UI correctly and persist after page reload and MQTT sync

title: Notification System for Threshold Alerts
description: Verify toast notifications trigger correctly when sensor data crosses configured warning or danger threshold levels.

steps.description: Configure alert thresholds in system settings for a specific sensor
Simulate or trigger sensor data crossing threshold levels
Verify toast notifications appear immediately with correct alert messages

title: MQTT Connection Reliability and Reconnection
description: Verify the MQTT client manages connections reliably, performing automatic reconnections with exponential backoff and respects maximum retry limits.

steps.description: Start the application and establish MQTT connection
Simulate MQTT broker disconnect or network failure
Verify MQTT client attempts reconnection using exponential backoff
Verify after maximum retries, client stops retrying and displays error notification

title: API Endpoint Performance under Normal Load
description: Verify that all critical API endpoints respond within 500ms under normal load conditions to ensure responsiveness.

steps.description: Send requests to key APIs including login, fetch sensor data, update relay status, user management
Measure response time and verify each API responds within 500ms

title: User Password Change and Profile Update
description: Verify that users can successfully change their password and update profile settings from their account pages.

steps.description: Login as a user
Navigate to profile and change password
Verify password change is accepted and effective on next login
Update user profile information such as display name
Verify profile updates are saved and reflected in the UI

title: Admin User Management: Create, Delete, Reset Password
description: Verify that admins can create new users, delete existing users, and reset passwords with proper effects.

steps.description: Login as admin and open user management page
Create a new user with valid details
Verify user appears in user list and can login
Reset the password of an existing user
Verify the user is forced to change password at next login
Delete a user and confirm deletion
Verify the user can no longer login and is removed from user list

title: System Settings Update and Persistence
description: Verify that configuration changes to MQTT broker, update intervals, and alert thresholds are saved and applied correctly.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to system settings page
Change MQTT broker configurations and sensor alert thresholds
Save the settings
Verify settings persist after page reload and system behaves accordingly (e.g. reconnects to new MQTT broker)

title: UI Responsiveness and Indonesian Localization
description: Verify the UI is fully responsive on desktop and mobile devices with all elements displaying correctly and all text localized in Indonesian.

steps.description: Access the application on desktop and various mobile devices
Verify layout adapts gracefully at different screen sizes
Verify all UI text is displayed in Indonesian as specified

title: Error Handling: Invalid MQTT Broker Configuration
description: Verify that entering invalid MQTT broker settings produces user-friendly error messages and prevents saving incorrect configurations.

steps.description: Navigate to system settings page
Input invalid MQTT broker URL or credentials
Attempt to save settings
Verify an error message is shown and settings are not saved

title: Dashboard Display of Server Time and Environmental Statistics
description: Verify that dashboard correctly displays current server time and updated environmental statistics including charts.

steps.description: Login and navigate to dashboard
Verify real-time server time display updates correctly
Verify environmental statistics charts show current sensor data visually

title: Sensor Individual Page Real-Time Data and History Navigation
description: Verify that individual sensor pages for DHT22, MQ2, PZEM-004T, BH1750 show correct real-time data, allow navigation to history, and export features.

steps.description: Login and navigate to each sensor page
Verify the real-time sensor readings update correctly
Navigate to sensor history tab
Verify history charts and tables load with accurate data for selected ranges
Export history data to Excel
Verify exported data matches displayed data
